page.title: 07FARMING
page.content: In our area there is mostly sheep farming. This is because the {main {land cover is grassland.} The farms are not very large mainly smallholdings and they all farm sheep and cattle. We have four livestock farms in our area. One of the largest is{Pantyffynon Farm}and they have 31 cows and 545 sheep. Pantyffynon farm covers 61 hectares. We found that most farmers had lived on the local farms for most of their lives. The majority of local farmers make use of the rough grazing on the { {Black Mountain}which covers a large area of our block. One disadvantage of farming livestock in our block is the distance livestock has to be transported to market-the nearest livestock market being some 20 miles outside the block.
